thread.title: USD's Lervick; SDSU's Smith Garner Summit League Players Of The Month
thread.title_full: USD's Lervick; SDSU's Smith Garner Summit League Players Of The Month

title: USD's Lervick; SDSU's Smith Garner Summit League Players Of The Month
text:
USD's Lervick; SDSU's Smith Garner Summit League Players Of The Month POSTED: 02:20 PM CDT Sep 30, 2015 Large Text ELMHURST, Ill. - 
South Dakota State’s Grant Smith was named Summit League Men’s Golfer of the Month and South Dakota’s Brenna Lervick garnered the Women’s Golfer of the Month awards for their performances during the month of September. More from KDLT Augustana Band and Community Band Concert 
Smith, a junior from Johnston, IA, collected his first career Golfer of the Month honor, he fired a 54-hole 211 (70-73-68) at The Jackrabbit placing higher than the No. 3 and No. 6 ranked collegiate golfers. Smith finished tied for fourth at the Ram Masters Invitational out of 88 golfers with a 210 (71-71-68) as South Dakota State took sixth in the tournament. He sank 18 birdies along with a pair of eagles in his six rounds for the month and had a 70.17 stroke average for the month with a pair of top-five finishes. 
Lervick, a junior from Chanhassen, MN, earned her first career Golfer of the Month award and took second place at the ORU Bob Hurley Shootout with a three-round 218 (72-76-70) out of 82 golfers. Her final round 2-under 70 at the ORU Bob Hurley Shootout was the lowest of the day and finished in a tie for fifth place at the Coyote Classic out of 45 individuals. She helped guide South Dakota to a pair of second-place finishes during the month and recorded two top-five finishes in both tournaments with a 76.17 stroke average. Copyright © 2015, KDLT. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
